achievements.name: ...Geovishap, Solarvishap, Lunarvishap...
achievements.desc: Defeat the Geovishap in all of its elemental forms.

achievements.name: Geo Elemental Reaction?
achievements.desc: Defeat the Primo Geovishap in all of its elemental forms.

achievements.name: Puppet Show-Off
achievements.desc: Defeat the Maguu Kenki while he is taunting you.

achievements.name: Totaled Totem
achievements.desc: Defeat an Electro Samachurl with no lightning totem on the field.

achievements.name: Did My Hand Fall From My Wrist?
achievements.desc: Defeat a Thunderhelm Lawachurl while in an enhanced state.

achievements.name: I'll Skip the Spa, Thanks
achievements.desc: Defeat a Mirror Maiden without being trapped by its Water Prison.

achievements.name: It's Quiet... Too Quiet...
achievements.desc: Defeat the Pyro Hypostasis after it enters its extinguished state only once

achievements.name: The Battle of Narukami Island
achievements.desc: Defeat the Perpetual Mechanical Array in its weakened state.

achievements.name: The Finishing Touch
achievements.desc: Defeat Azhdaha without ever having gained a shield.
